name: 99th Street
description:
Watch a video here

A prototype of a skating engine, grind and wallrides.

Run and grind around a little level.

Controls:

  • WASD/Left Thumbstick - Move
  • Space/[A] - Jump
  • Mouse/Right Thumbstick - Look around
  • Q/[Y] [when grinding] - Change Direction
  • E/[X] [when grinding] - Trick, increases speed
  • Left Shift/[LT] - Reset camera

Known bugs:

  • Wallrides aren't 100% complete yet (not even 50%)
  • Bugs I'm aware of are labelled on the map
  • Tricks can be spammed as fast as you can button mash
  • Reset camera goes to an annoying angle
